articles.title: Too much ‘Magnificent Seven’? A revenue-weighted index fund may be the solution.

articles.title: Can Elon Musk do ‘whatever he wants’? Why moving Tesla out of Delaware may spook investors.
articles.content: Tesla Inc. Chief Executive Elon Musk’s push to reincorporate the electric-vehicle maker in Texas after a legal defeat in Delaware may have broader implications for the company.

articles.title: Why you can count on the Dow making changes in February
articles.content: Investors can count on the Dow Jones Industrial Average changing its members next month, for the first time in nearly four years, for several reasons. The question is, who’s out and who’s in?
